title: When will schools reopen, and what will change for students? - Quora

response.answer_text: Reopening of schools will depend on the states and the active patients present in that state. In Maharashtra the schools will reopen from January 2021 (according to me) Following changes for students and staff Wear maskDo not share your tiffinWashing your hands after every subject periodPhysical distancingThe school will be open on only 5 days a week (as I think)No occasions like annual gathering or open houseThe bus will be sanitized dailyNo primary school student will come to school
